amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to fund dairy education in Iowa.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds made available in the Act from being used to fund dairy education in Iowa.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 92 - 325 (Roll no. 190).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
